ingredients.ingredient: 4 sweet Italian turkey sausage links (such as Jennie-O®)
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
1 green bell pepper, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cook sausage until browned on all sides, then remove and slice before finishing with peppers
Cut peppers into large chunks so they maintain their texture and don't become mushy
Use high heat and don't crowd the pan for proper caramelization of vegetables
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you create a flavorful one-skillet meal that highlights the sausage and sweet peppers?
